# General guidenlines

:::{.rmdimportant}
Most people go through the same evolution when learing a new technique:

+ I don't understand it and have to look it up every time I use it =>
+ I vaguely understand it but still read the documentation a lot =>
+ I understand it and can use it fluidly
:::

:::{.rmdimportant}
Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

> Martin Fowler
:::
